text: re-designed the interface for Dora, an AI surgery assistant
worked on the website for Spiral, Seb McLauchlan's forthcoming type foundry
developed strategy for Zenno Astronautics and Midjourney
worked on redesigning Bliss
became Product Design Lead at 21e8, researching and developing applications for new networked compute infrastructure and interfaces
co-organised post.design/tangle in Sweden, Denmark and Norway
worked as an independent design researcher and strategist for architecture and build praxis Archival Studies
returned to Copenhagen to work as Concept-to-Consumer Manager at Empirical Spirits and launched a wine subscription service for Pompette
worked as a strategist and designer for the Wellington City Council
co-organised the SEGD's Off Grid conference in Wellington, New Zealand
worked for Stephen Wong MW and co-organised New Zealand's first natural wine festival, Budburst
worked at Amass Restaurant in Copenhagen and interned at the MAD Symposium, as well as Restaurant Relae and Attica
